description:
Casual high-tops made in the iconic Vans’ silhouette. The SK8-HI 38 Decons are ready for urban adventures by foot or by board. Made from naturally sourced and organic materials they support sustainability from the ground up.

  • Organically grown cotton canvas is hard wearing and easy to clean
  • Jute laces: fast-growing, renewable fibre that uses minimal water
  • Natural rubber sole wears the classic Vans waffle-cut tread
  • Made with water-based glues and inks
  • Unisex sizes, women's US shoe size is 1.5 sizes smaller than the equivalent unisex size. Please refer to the size chart to find your appropriate size
name: Vans SK8-HI 38 Decon SF Shoes - Unisex
